item.title: Terraform: Concepts and Getting Started
item.description: Concepts Terraform essentially a tool to manage your infrastructure. Given a set of configurations about how your infrastructure should look like, terraform would help to reconcile the configurations with reality. The configurations contain resources that compose your infrastructure expressed in Terraform language (HCL). Consider the example of the configuration below. When this configuration applied, it would make sure that there are two EC2 instances in your AWS infrastructure using the provided AMI.
